get.summary: [GET] Returns current registration end dates and review start dates for general and freshmen from the active standardized semester.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to get registration dates for. If null, uses the current date.

get.summary: [GET] Get ministry accepted programme by id.

parameters.name: rowOffset
parameters.description: (optional) Offset for pagination. Row where to start fetching from.

parameters.name: fetchSize
parameters.description: (optional) Fetch size for pagination. How many rows to fetch.

get.summary: [GET] Get a list of programmes for a school.

parameters.name: onlyFreshmenEnabled
parameters.description: (optional) Boolean to filter only freshmen enabled programmes.

get.summary: [GET] Check if any programme is open for admission for any school.
[GET] Fetch list of grades by national Id.

parameters.name: nationalId
parameters.description: (required) National Id of the students being fetched for.

get.summary: [GET] Check if student is a freshman

definedInCurriculum.description: Indicates if the admission requirements are defined in the schools curriculum.

freeText.description: Free text field for additional admission requirements.

islandIsApplicationId.description: Reference Id to the Island.is application

applicantNationalId.description: The national ID  of the applicant

applicantAge.description: Applicant age calculated from national ID

attachments.description: Attachments that the applicant has uploaded

placeOfResidence.description: Place of residence if other than legal home

postCode.description: Postcode of residence if other than legal home

municipality.description: Municipality of residence if other than legal home

nextOfKin.description: The national ID of the next of kin

speakingLanguage.description:
code of language spoken by the applicant
e.g. en = English 
Follows the ISO 639-1 standard
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639_language_codes

schoolChoices.description: List of schools being applied to

ApplicationBaseDto.description: Base properties for creating an application

schoolChoices.description: List of schools being applied to

currentApplicantStatus.description:
Status of the applicant 
0 = Neither
1 = InSchoolOnHighSchoolLevel
2 = RegisteredWithLabourInstitute
Default is 0 which is applicable for most students

schoolChoices.description: List of schools being applied to

currentApplicantStatus.description:
Status of the applicant 
0 = Neither
1 = InSchoolOnHighSchoolLevel
2 = RegisteredWithLabourInstitute
Default is 0 which is applicable for most students

contentType.description:
Content type (e.g., "application/pdf", "application/msword").
Not contstrained to a specific set of values.

Content type (e.g., "pdf").
Not contstrained to a specific set of values.

title.description: Title of the core subject group.

subjects.description: List of subjects that are a part of the core subject group.

grade.description: Grade, e.g. A, B, C, D

id.description: Integer representing the level of qualification.

shortDescription.description: Short description of the level, used for display purposes.

name.description: Name of the next of kin

email.description: Email of the next of kin

address.description: Place of residence of the next of kin

postCode.description: Postcode of the next of kin

requiredPackages.description: Number of packages that must be chosen from the list of packages.

packages.description: List of packages that can be chosen, where each package contains a list of subjects.

subjects.description: List of subjects that are a part of the package.

programmeId.description: Reference to the programme being selected

priority.description:
Priority of the programme
1 highest priority, 2 second highest priority, etc.

programmeId.description: Reference to the programme being selected

priority.description:
Priority of the programme
1 highest priority, 2 second highest priority, etc.

isSpecialNeedsProgramme.description: Boolean value indicating if the programme is a special needs programme

rank.description: The ranking of the programme choice

weightedAverage.description: Calculated weighted average for the programme

status.description:
Status of the programme choice
Available values are New, Processing, AcceptedWaiting, Accepted, OtherProgrammeAccepted, Rejected

studyTracks.description: List of study tracks to filter by.

levels.description: List of levels to filter by.

schools.description: List of schools to filter by.

countryAreas.description: List of country areas to filter by.

ministrySerial.description:
Unique ministry serial number of the programme (IS: Ráðuneytisnúmer).
Format: YY-000-L-XX where YY=Year of approval, 000=Sequential number, L=Level of qualification, X(X)=Qualification identifier.
Example: 26-575-3-6

studyTrack.description: Study track of the programme (IS: Námsleið).

qualification.description: Qualification awarded upon completion of the programme (IS: Námslok).

specialization.description: Specialization / Programme type of the programme (IS: Sérhæfing / Námsbrautategund).

structureDescription.description: Description of the programme structure, and any special requirements. (IS: Skipulag)

allowsFreeChoice.description: Indicates if the programme allows free choice of courses. (IS: Frjálst val leyft)

freeChoiceDescription.description: Description of the free choice rules for the programme. (IS: Frjálst val - lýsing)

academicProgress.description: Description of the rules for the academic progress in the programme. (IS: Reglur um námsframvindu)

academicProgressDefinedInCurriculum.description: Indicates if the academic progress rules are defined in the schools curriculum.

academicEvaluation.description: Description of academic evaluation criteria for the programme. (IS: Námsmat)

academicEvaluationDefinedInCurriculum.description: Indicates if the academic evaluation criteria are defined in the schools curriculum.

competencyCriteria.description: Competency criteria for the programme. (IS: Hæfniviðmið)

admissionRequirements.description: Admission requirements for the programme. (IS: Inntökuskilyrði)

ministrySerial.description:
Unique ministry serial number of the programme (IS: Ráðuneytisnúmer).
Format: YY-000-L-XX where YY=Year of approval, 000=Sequential number, L=Level of qualification, X(X)=Qualification identifier.
Example: 26-575-3-6

studyTrack.description: Study track of the programme (IS: Námsleið).

qualification.description: Qualification awarded upon completion of the programme (IS: Námslok).

specialization.description: Specialization / Programme type of the programme (IS: Sérhæfing / Námsbrautategund).

id.description: Unique ID of the programme specialization.

tags.description: Tags associated with the programme specialization.

coreSubjectGroups.description: List of subject groups that are the core of the programme.

packageChoices.description: List of package choices, where each package choice contains a list of packages.

subjectChoiceGroups.description: List of subjects that can be chosen freely, with a required number of credits.

uniqueIdentifier.description:
A unique identifier for the qualification (IS: Námslokanúmer).
Corresponds to the last section of the ministry serial, 00-000-0-X

priority.description:
Priority of the school being applied to 
1 highest priority, 2 second highest priority, etc.

schoolId.description: Id of school being applied to

semesterId.description: Id of semester being applied to

Third language chosen by the applicant

northernLanguage.description:
Northern langauge chosen by the applicant
e.g. da = Danish

priority.description:
Priority of the school being applied to

SchoolChoiceStatus of the application
Possible values are
NewApplication, Processing, AcceptedWaiting, Accepted, AcceptedInOtherSchool, Rejected

schoolId.description: What school is being applied to

availableDormitory.description: Does the school offer a dormitory

anyOpenForAdmissionGeneral.description: If any programmes are open for admission

anyOpenForAdmissionFreshman.description: If any programmes are open for admission for freshman

isDeleted.description: Whether entity is marked as deleted.

countryArea.description: Country area of the school (IS: Landshluti).

hasActiveApplication.description: Does the student have an active application

applications.description: List of applications the student has applied

isced.description: ISCED code of the study track.

requiredCredits.description: Number of credits that must be chosen from the list of subjects.

subjects.description: List of subjects that can be chosen freely, with a required number of credits.

level1.description: Amount of Level 1 credits are included in the subject structure.

level2.description: Amount of Level 2 credits are included in the subject structure.

credits.description: Total amount of credits are included in the subject structure.
